data.text: Sambi uitape mbuli ya mayo,
Leka wanhu wayagwe wakutogole,
Dibwe zito na msanga vivija,
Ng'hasiliki yoluma na kugevuzika kobananga,
Vinoga kwa munhu yokuzuma kunze kunze,
Kukomhokeligwa na mbwiga wako kolagusa unogelwa,
Munhu yegute hata uki koulema,
Kamba ndege yokala kutali na mvulu yake,
Mavuta na mnung'ho vounogeza moyo,
Sambi uwasemwe mbwiga zako hebu mbwiga wa tatako.
Mwanangu uwe na ubala ili uunogeze moyo wangu,
Munhu mbala koyona ng'hondo na kuifisa,
Munhu yahaiduwila kumwikila lahani mgeni sola kiwalo chake,
Munhu yomulamusa miyage kwa sauti ng'hulu ulukwili,
Mtwanzi mgomvi kaigala na mawaga hagamala siku ya mvula.
Munhu yolonda kumkimila kaigala na munhu yodikimila beho,
Zuma dopisha zuma diyagwe,
Yoditunza biki da mtini koja matunda gake.
Kamba kihanga vichoneka mgamazi,
Kuzimu na Kuubananzi haviguta,
Zahabu na shaba vopimigwa muumoto,
Hata uhamuhonda mbozi mdituli,
Ilole goya fugo yako,
kwavija ugoli haukala milele,
Mijani yahanyala na mijani iyagwe yozuka,
ng'hondolo okugwaa mibahila mbuli ya viwalo,
kokuwa na maziwa mengi ga mbuzi,
